text: The General Atomics MQ-1 Predator is an American unmanned aerial vehicle. It is used by the US Air Force and the CIA for reconnaissance and as light attack aircraft. It is a single-engine aircraft. It was used in Afghanistan and Iraq. Its main weapon is the AGM-114 Hellfire light missile. Italy, Morocco, and UAE are foreign operators. Category:Drones Category:United States Air Force aircraft
title: General Atomics MQ-1 Predator
